scripts.prepare: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c '[ "$NODE_ENV" = production ] && exit 0; pnpm hasura update-cli --version v2.44.0-beta.1'
scripts.db:local:seed-apply: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'hasura seed apply --disable-interactive --database-name default'
scripts.db:remote:metadata-ic: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'hasura metadata ic list --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.db:remote:migrate-init: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'hasura migrate create init --from-server --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.db:remote:remove-create-token-seed: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'hasura seed create tokens_seed --from-table token --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.k6:start: cd __test__/k6 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml up -d && echo 'Waiting for Grafana to start...' && sleep 5 && open http://localhost:3001/d/k6-performance/k6-performance-dashboard?orgId=1&from=now-6h&to=now&timezone=browser
scripts.k6:remote:run: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- k6 run --compatibility-mode=experimental_enhanced --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/k6 __test__/k6/scripts/load-test.ts | tee __test__/k6/output/metrics/k6-output.txt
scripts.k6:local:analyze: mkdir -p __test__/k6/output/metrics && trap 'pnpm k6:stop && pnpm k6:clean' EXIT SIGINT; pnpm k6:local:seed && pnpm k6:start && pnpm k6:local:run
scripts.k6:remote:analyze: mkdir -p __test__/k6/output/metrics && trap 'pnpm k6:stop && pnpm k6:clean' EXIT SIGINT; pnpm k6:start && pnpm k6:remote:run
